notesStmt.note: The nineteenth chapter (paṭala) of the Śāradātilakatantra, complete in 134 verses. Title from colophon and from left margins of verso leaves.
Fair condition. Manuscript has a vertical fold down its middle. Mistakes crossed through or blotched out with black. A couple marginal corrections.

Text begins (f. 1r): śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ. atha vakṣye mantraratnaṁ samastapuruṣārthadaṁ avāpūryena japtena divyaṁ jñānaṁ munīśvarāḥ (verse 1). dakṣiṇāmūrtaye pūrvaṁ tubhyaṁ padam anantaraṁ vaṭamūlapadasyāṁ te padaṁ paścānnivāsine (verse 2).
Text ends: bahunā kim ihoktena mantreṇānena bhūtale sadṛśo nāsti mantronyo bhūtanigrahasādhakaḥ (verse 134).
Colophon (f. 5v): iti śrīśāradātilake ekonaviṁśatimaḥ paṭalaḥ. sābārpaṇam astu.
